title: ANSHENIU RISE: A Magical Metamorphic Tale of Adventure and Friendship
description: Amelia and Jade, friends as close as sisters, grew up with only their mothers and each other to depend on. In this metamorphic coming of age tale, the girls transform to the women they were always supposed to be, fulfilling their destiny. The story is filled with battles between good and evil over jealousy and love, and lifeâ€™s growing pains. The main characters Amelia, Jade, Satchel and Cristos are captivating and demand a full novel all to themselves, but they come together in Ansheniu Rise to tell their story, how they came to be, and their struggle to return home to Caroni.
author: K. Kellee
